name: Witch's Den
description:
On the day that a Witch begins their journey as a poisoneer, an Elder Hag will bestow them their first poisonous plant: the False Fig. From there, they can set out on their own into the magical world of morbidly killing people...

As the apprentice witch, grow various poisonous plants, brew deadly poisons, and help out many a folk who needs something killed! Earn reputation with three different factions to access new plants, and expand your deadly arsenal.

Controls:

  • Just press LEFT CLICK on everything lol

Made by ruby and BirbMom for MiniJam 129: Poison. Special thanks to my friends Mia and Guthrie for proofreading some things and helping me out with some concepts!
